    • Constructor Detail

      • Habit

        public Habit(java.lang.String title,
             java.lang.String reason,
             java.util.Date startDate,
             java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> days,
             java.lang.String type)
        Construct a new habit object
        Parameters:
        title - the name of the habit (not null)
        reason - the reason prompting the habit (not null)
        startDate - the date the user wants to start the habit (not null)
        days - the days of the week the event should occur on (Sunday = 1, Saturday = 7)
        type - the habit type category this habit falls under
